name: events4u
description: A simple Event Emitter for JavaScript and TypeScript

scripts.build-lib: npm run clean-tmp && tsc && npm run babel && npm run browserify
scripts.test: npm run build-tests && npm run tests
scripts.browserify: browserify tmpp/index.js > lib/events4u.js && npm run browserify-post
scripts.copy: copy src\*.ts lib && copy tmp\*.d.ts lib
scripts.browserify-post: npm run copy && npm run clean-tmp
